alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake and Bear River Valley; Sanpete Valley; Wasatch Back (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued May 20 at 1:53PM MDT until May 21 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 AM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 expected. In the Bear River Valley, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 20 expected. * WHERE...Sanpete Valley, Bear River Valley, Wasatch Back. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 9 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake and Bear River Valley; Sanpete Valley; Wasatch Back
